name: Cursed 2020
description:
NOTICE:

On time release build suffered from files access restrictions, resulting in AI not working at all, making the first part of the game unplayable outside of game engine. Current release build (fixed after the deadline) can be found here:
https://github.com/Drarch/Cursed2020/releases

Description:

Game representing the curse of 2020. A Casual City Builder with autonomous AI agent..... or something completely different.

Source: https://github.com/Drarch/Cursed2020, with after submission bug hunting
